metadata.shortInfo: This track shows classical alleles comprised of insertions, deletions, substitutions and complex changes. These alleles were typically generated during forward genetic screens. Red boxes represent deletions; yellow diamonds represent substitutions; blue boxes represent complex substitutions; and white triangles represent insertions.

style.height: function(feature) {var rflp = feature.get('rflp'); var status = feature.get('status'); if (rflp && status == 'Confirmed') {return 14;} else {return 8;} }
